website_summaries.verdict: Nike is renown for making numerous types of quality athletic shoes, and the Air Precisions are no exception - a comfortable, stylish, well-made pair that feels as good as they look on the court.
pros: Attractive shoes that are both comfortable and nicely structured, as they have a mid to high top design with supportive cushioning plus a shock-absorbing heel air unit
cons: Sizes run somewhat narrow, and the top portion is hard to adjust

customer_reviews.title: Very bad shoes they’re not what they seem to be.
customer_reviews.text: Everything was perfect until I started wearing this shoes, they were very good option that’s what I thought and they broke after one week. A picture says more than thousands words. I’m very disappointed because I want to play and now I cannot.
customer_reviews.author: Wanel Z.

customer_reviews.title: The best and most comfortable Nike's
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable to wear and provide great support without suffocating your feet!! They breath!
customer_reviews.author: RPavone

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL!
customer_reviews.text: Not a huge Nike fan d/t affiliation with Colon Crapperdick, but I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: William R. DeSilvey

customer_reviews.title: Light, but stiff and cheap feeling.
customer_reviews.text: When they say lightweight, they are not kidding. Wearing these in my living rokm felt like i was walking on concrete. No arch support. Stiff as cardboard. To the point i was questioning if they were authentic. I could never play basketball in these. Hyperdunks are my go to, but the design is getting cheaper and cheaper. I wore my recent HD's three times and had to abandon them from foot pain. It's a shame. And these "Precision" ones are 10x worse.
customer_reviews.author: Daddy of Twins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Real basketball players know shoes. If you ever think about you shoe while playing it's not right. These fit me perfectly. 4 of the last 5 pairs I've tried I've sent back. I bought two pair of these--superb heel hold, super-even tie-down pressure, great air flow/breathability, superb court stick. A basketball shoe for basketball players.
customer_reviews.author: Popeloy

customer_reviews.title: Wear these for work as a tile installer. I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Nikes usually run small for me. Most nikes fit too tight around my toes and cause me discomfort. These fit snugly around the toes but after a good break in time, maybe a few hours, they became very comfortable. Most nikes don't ever break in like these did, so I'm happy with the purchase. Will probably buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe that true to size. Excellent price too. Would definitely purchase again. Highly recommended. Amazon delivered as promised.
customer_reviews.author: RetVAFireMan

customer_reviews.title: Durable, nice looking, great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great sneakers, my son is 13 he wears them all the time. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: My pair were defective. The right foot shoe had too much material at the bottom front which created an ugly bulge that I could feel uncomfortably inside the shoe. Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Justask

customer_reviews.title: They are what I expected..
customer_reviews.text: They are what I expected after wearing them for two hours of tennis, felt good! Need more time to fully evaluate.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Young

customer_reviews.title: Reeks of some flowery smelling substance
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because they work for my kid. This will be his 4th pair. But I don’t know what the heck they sprayed on the box! The entire package and the shoes smell like carpet deodorizer. It’s so strong I have washed my hand 3 times and they still smell!
customer_reviews.author: Onlineshoppermom

customer_reviews.title: really hurt her feet
customer_reviews.text: My daughter plays basketball..and she has 'preferred' nikes..these hurt her feet so much...she wore them twice..and could not wear them again due to the fact it was effecting her game..what a disappointment...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good shoes! Fits wide feet as well!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this same pair of basketball shoes for years now! It says size 12 but it also fits wide feet! It has just the right amount of room to offer you room to breathe but not so much that you will fell like you'll roll an ankle in the process! Will continue to buy more in the future when needed!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: My daughter - who is a sophomore in High School - put these shoes on yesterday and went straight to practice! Shoes fit great and she had no problems with breaking them in!
customer_reviews.author: James Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I'm a retired 67 year old aging athlete, and between weight training, bicycling, walking and Pickleball... I work out approximately 15 -20 hours per week. So well constructed good fitting shoes are a must. These fit the bill. Great fit. Durable. Lightweight. Would def buy these again if available.
customer_reviews.author: ColoradoConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: The outside of one of the shoes has ripped right down the side. Not sure why, they are used for everyday walking, not used for basketball.
customer_reviews.author: Veno M@dness

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good fit!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes! I got them for my husband for Christmas 🤗 and he is hard to please when it comes to tennis shoes.
customer_reviews.author: CherCher

customer_reviews.title: It’s a pair of sneakers.
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift for my husband, he loved it. Always nervous about buying him sneakers bc well men and their sneakers...
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work this time
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had these shoes for basketball in the past and loved them, which is why we hunted for another pair. With this pair, after wearing them for 3-4 weeks, we had to buy another brand new pair of shoes. She complained of sliding in them due to poor traction, no matter what we tried to do to fix the problem. These might be better for just casual wear.
customer_reviews.author: JBK

customer_reviews.title: Size ran very small.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered them a size up and couldn't get my feet into them.
customer_reviews.author: c. tolson

customer_reviews.title: Good support, narrow top
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to put on kind oh have to push the foot through, not sure if it’s bcs it’s narrower then standard or just bcs the laces are tight. A bit squeaky sounding but overall a great shoe with good support.
customer_reviews.author: Talia Haune

customer_reviews.title: Grandson liked
customer_reviews.text: SHoes as pictured and Grandson was happy - so I was happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Yindee

customer_reviews.title: Everthing is fine as far as measurements
customer_reviews.text: But in an indoor court, this shoe is too slippery. Best to use it outside.
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: new shoes
customer_reviews.text: liked the shoes but not the price. Shipping was late
customer_reviews.author: DRG

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fit well and was comfortable for several hours of outdoor ball so far
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Teenager approved
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Only issue so far was one shoe came creased. My son wasn't happy about that. Didn't bother him enough to return them but enough for him to complain a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: As good as we expect from Nike!
customer_reviews.text: Used for as racquetball and they get a workout! Excellent traction on the hardwood. Comfortable from day one. As good as we expect from Nike
customer_reviews.author: James Peters

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: That is my second purchase for that same shoe as the first one was so comfortable while playing basketball. It might feel tight at first but once u wear it it will adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I purchased because the first pair was perfect. I wear an orthotic insert for arch support in addition.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy L.Ferris

customer_reviews.title: but I would recommend the shoe
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them, have only owned them for about a month so I can't gauge the longevity just yet, but I would recommend the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Strubbe

customer_reviews.title: Good but the size is wrong .I take size
customer_reviews.text: Good merchandise but its not wide so problem to put my leg comfortable
customer_reviews.author: avi

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoe we have found for my husband who complains of foot pain. This was the second purchase of this brand and style.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Expectations Exceeded
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for as a gentleman with relatively wider than average feet, as well as the need to wear ankle braces and not feel constrained.
customer_reviews.author: Maverick

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for Pickleball courts
customer_reviews.text: the tread is short and has a great ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: WJJP

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: My son loved the new shoes. He gets compliments all the time.
customer_reviews.author: J Rose

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: Used these for my normal basketball shoes and use them 3 times a week. They only last 4 wears until the shoelace strap started fraying. Will only get maybe 10 wears before needing another pair
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T. McCartney

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and supportive
customer_reviews.text: it's comfortable and supportive ~good one , will buy another one ~ only flaw is easy to pick up sands and gravels, so you will need to clean up the bottom after every time you played / ~
customer_reviews.author: Peng Zhang

customer_reviews.title: would buy them again
customer_reviews.text: Bought these a month ago for general use at the gym - basketball, treadmill, etc. Very happy. Comfortable. Lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyK

customer_reviews.title: Proceed with caution that's all I'm gonna say
customer_reviews.text: Bruh. I bought a pair 11.5 in the bluish color and black. Bruh these mugs came in black and white in 9.5s. Pisspoor :l
customer_reviews.author: Ace Exeter

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe but had imperfections
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are nice however ours came with what appears to be a glue stain on them from when they were made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nike quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, fit and feel, and good looking along with comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: LIKEBOOKS

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Get an insole for this shoe, the one it comes with does nothing
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Martinez

customer_reviews.title: good fit, great basketball shoe
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised, Right size, good fit, great basketball shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Jim D North Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Everything went fine and then....
customer_reviews.text: they delivered it to the wrong address. Perfect fit, delivered when promised, and they go and deliver it to my neighbor.
customer_reviews.author: john b1970

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes, a little slick on the court though
customer_reviews.text: Shoes feel great, traction on the basketball court is not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... these shows for my Husband and they fit really good and loves them
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shows for my Husband and they fit really good and loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are nice shoes my son likes them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Chakakhan Brown

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Run a little small because of the elastic band inside of shoe. Returning for a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Enrico

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, great support
customer_reviews.text: I personally love this style of Nike. This is my fourth color pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Sportek for life

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Air Precision High-Top Mesh Basketball
product_meta.description: When it comes to finding the right pair of athletic shoes, you cannot beat quality design. While there may be many different types of shoes to choose from, a great pair of running shoes is specifically designed for just that: running. Design is how Nike shoes distinguish themselves above the rest. Air Precision shoes are meticulously crafted with this in mind, featuring a rubber sole able to effortlessly provide the traction needed to keep you moving forward at full speed, while also supplying the flexibility to enable you to move naturally. Constructed with synthetic fabric able to absorb any excess moisture while creating a lightweight, breathable atmosphere for your feet, the fusion of form and function in Air Precision makes them the best athletic shoes for anything you have in mind.
